Text: This is a MVGroup release. Seeder(s) will appear. Please have patience.
Still waiting for seeds here too, after 4 days.  Got the 3 first episodes, so hopefully you will eventually seed the last 3 as well....

Episode 6 will  be released on 14th Feb 2010.
Episode 5 is seeding. MVGroup have a policy to only seed 1 episode every 2 days. This allows the slower downloaders to keep up.
Take a look at forums[dot]mvgroup[dot]org
You need to sign up but the torrents are free.
PLEASE READ THE TEXT ABOVE BEFORE POSTING.
